alerts.title: EU AI Act Officially Passed
alerts.summary: European Parliament officially passes AI Act with strict regulatory requirements for high-risk AI systems, including biometric recognition and critical infrastructure.

alerts.title: SEC Cybersecurity Disclosure Rules
alerts.summary: SEC requires public companies to disclose material cybersecurity incidents within 4 business days, enhancing investor protection.

alerts.title: Singapore PDPA Amendments Effective
alerts.summary: Personal Data Protection Act amendments take effect, strengthening data breach notification obligations and cross-border data transfer requirements.

alerts.title: EU Data Governance Act Implementation
alerts.summary: Data Governance Act officially implemented, establishing data intermediation services and data altruism framework to promote data sharing.

alerts.title: US Export Control Updates
alerts.summary: Bureau of Industry and Security updates export control list, strengthening controls on advanced computing chips and semiconductor manufacturing equipment.

alerts.title: Thailand PDPA Implementation Rules
alerts.summary: PDPA implementation rules released, clarifying specific obligations and compliance requirements for data controllers and processors.

alerts.title: EU Digital Services Act Full Implementation
alerts.summary: Digital Services Act takes effect for all online platforms, requiring enhanced content moderation and user protection measures.

alerts.title: Malaysia Personal Data Protection Standards Update
alerts.summary: Updated personal data protection standards, strengthening data security requirements and cross-border data transfer regulations.

alerts.title: US Intellectual Property Protection Initiatives
alerts.summary: USPTO launches new intellectual property protection programs, enhancing patent support for small and medium enterprises.

alerts.title: Vietnam Cybersecurity Law Implementation Rules
alerts.summary: Cybersecurity Law implementation rules released, specifying data localization storage and cross-border transfer requirements.

alerts.title: EU Intellectual Property Enforcement Updates
alerts.summary: Enhanced intellectual property enforcement measures, particularly targeting online infringement activities.

alerts.title: Indonesia Personal Data Protection Law Implementation
alerts.summary: Personal Data Protection Law officially implemented, establishing data subject rights and data controller obligations.

alerts.title: US Customs Import Compliance Requirements
alerts.summary: Updated import commodity compliance requirements, strengthening restrictions on forced labor products.

alerts.title: Philippines Data Privacy Act Guidelines
alerts.summary: National Privacy Commission releases Data Privacy Act implementation guidelines, clarifying data processing principles.

alerts.title: EU Critical Raw Materials Import Controls
alerts.summary: Strengthened import controls on critical raw materials, ensuring supply chain security and strategic autonomy.

activities.action: EU AI Act risk assessment completed
